狪狪狪

狪字的基本解释

狪
tóng
〔狪狪〕古书上说的一种野兽：“（泰山）有兽焉，其状如豚而有珠，名曰狪狪，其鸣自叫。”

狪
dòng
中国西南地区少数民族之一，今作“侗”。

狪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tóng］
［《集韻》徒東切，平東，定。］
(1)见“狪狪”。
(2)见“狪犬”。
[②]［dòng］
我国少数民族名。今作“侗”。

狪字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狪； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页711第05
【集韻】他東切，音通。【山海經】泰山有獸，其狀如豚而有珠，名曰狪狪。其鳴自訆。【註】郭璞曰：音如吟恫之恫。騈雅曰：狪狪，珠豚也。亶爰子曰：召慵狪，使先驅。【郭璞·狪狪圖贊】蚌則含珠，獸何不可。狪狪如豚，被褐懷禍。患難無由，招之自我。　又【集韻】徒東切，音同。本作?。野彘。或作?。慵字原从巾从庸，疑慵。

考證：〔【山海經】泰山有獸，名曰狪狪。其名自䚯。〕　謹照山海經之例其名改其鳴。䚯改訆。
狪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
狪字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
tóng
〔狪狪] A kind of beast said in ancient books: "(Mount Tai) has a beast, which looks like a dolphin and has beads. The name is 狪狪, and its call is self-proclaimed."
Stubborn
dòng
One of the ethnic minorities in southwestern China, this is the "Dong".
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tóng］
["Jiyun" Tu Dongqie, Pingdong, Ding. ]
(1) See "Hunting".
(2) See "Hairy Dog".
[②]［dòng］
The names of ethnic minorities in our country. This is called "Dong".
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狪; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 711 05
[Jiyun] He cuts to the east, and the sound is good. [Shanhaijing] There are beasts in Mount Tai, which are like dolphin and beaded, and their name is cricket. Its ming is self-sufficient. [Note] Guo Pu said: The sound is like yinxuezhixue. Piya said: 狪狪, beaded dolphin. Qi Yanzi said: Call Xuanxuan, make pioneers. [Guo Pu·Golden Picture Compliment] Mussels contain beads, why not beasts. The squalor is like a dolphin, and the brown bears misfortune. There is no reason for adversity, but self is recruited.　[Jiyun] It’s the same sound. This work?. Ye Yu. Or for?. The word 慵 was originally from the towel Congyong, suspicious. Textual research: [[Shanhaijing] There are beasts in Mount Tai, whose name is crippling. Its name is self-defeating. 〕 　 I would like to change its name according to the law of the mountain and sea. Quaint.
